text: we may not have monsoons here in North
America but Memorial Day marks the
traditional onset of wedding season as
young couples flood down the aisles Mira
Nair's monsoon wedding is the story of a
far-flung Punjabi family reuniting in
Delhi to celebrate a marriage this is an
especially vibrant and satisfying
example of a wedding movie genre that
combines in roughly equal measure
melodrama and farce really big huge Hulk
can spend your whole life singing and
dancing why not there's generational
conflict sexual intrigue family secrets
and a series of mishaps and
misunderstand
monsoon wedding is an exceptionally well
made wedding movie it has a wonderfully
eclectic score that combines traditional
and contemporary elements a large and
energetic international cast and the
cinematography the costume design and
the art direction combined to create a
vivid and sometimes overwhelming sense
of being right there in India mir and i
air draws together an unruly tangle of
plots and subplots and handles them with
clarity and grace
each story is about a relationship and
each one shows us a different aspect of
love you had every reason to be angry
someone broke my heart through a few
years ago I know how hard and confusing
it can be there are so many ways that
love can be complicating disappointing
ways it can go terribly terribly wrong
but Monsoon Wedding also shows us how
the sweetest and purest manifestations
of love can take us by surprise even at
a wedding
yes
you
